about: I am a final year undergraduate student at IIT kharagpur of the department of Geology and Geophysics enrolled in its Integrated Msc course.Experienced Professional with a demonstrated history of working in the education management industry.Finance Enthusiast.

current_company.name: KYC Hub
current_company.title: AM @ Groww || KYC Hub || IIT KGP

experience.title: Core Team Head
experience.description: • Served as Core Team Head of Events Team, Inter IIT Sports Meet, selected from a total of 350 applicants• Tasked with the organization of the 35th Aquatics Meet which shall witness over 500 participants for a period of five days• Looked into the smooth conduction of the 54th Inter IIT Sports Meet comprising of 4 games and 11 sports, in December 2019, which saw a participation of 23 IITs and had a footfall of over 2500 sportspersons for a period of nine days• Spearheaded a firsthand initiative to develop and maintain an official website for the purpose of dissemination of information about hall activities and achievements of its boarders among the alumni and other willing recipients • Collaborated with Technology Adventure Society, IIT Kharagpur to conduct an informal Adventure Weekend for participants
experience.description_html: • Served as Core Team Head of Events Team, Inter IIT Sports Meet, selected from a total of 350 applicants• Tasked with the organization of the 35th Aquatics Meet which shall witness over 500 participants for a period of five days• Looked into the smooth conduction of the 54th Inter IIT Sports Meet comprising of 4 games and 11 sports, in December 2019, which saw a participation of 23 IITs and had a footfall of over 2500 sportspersons for a period of nine days• Spearheaded a firsthand initiative to develop and maintain an official website for the purpose of dissemination of information about hall activities and achievements of its boarders among the alumni and other willing recipients • Collaborated with Technology Adventure Society, IIT Kharagpur to conduct an informal Adventure Weekend for participants

experience.title: Secretary
experience.description: • Efficiently managed a budget of Rs 3,40,000 with conduction of events like powerlifting workshops, Open IIT Powerlifting tournaments ,Fresher’s powerlifting workshop ,NSO trials and General Championship weightlifting competition during my tenure• Managed a team of 8 players in INTER IIT 2018, SPARDHA 2018 which bagged silver and bronze medals respectively
